title: Confederation College
body: This was a site rebuild of Confederation College's main site. We used Drupal 7 for the main site.

title: Hammer Fight
body:
Hammer Fight is a couch co op multiplayer that pits 2 - 4 players against each other in a death arena style setting. It places you on a foreign world where you are pitted to death against your fellow astronauts. You are tasked with a anti-gravity hammer and some your quick reflexes. You must now survive in this a death arena. Only 1 colour can survive.

This initially started off as a game jam with 2 other friends of mine. We thought it was fun and took it a little further. We ended up showing it at Forest City Comicon in London Ontario.

title: Hypoglycemia App
body: This was a thesis project for school, I partnered with Digital Echidna to work on the app. They did the initial design. I worked on the back-end API and the app. I used Drupal for the back-end and used AngularJS and Ionic for the front-end then wrapped it up with PhoneGap.

title: Indegene Omnipresence
body: This was an Ionic app I worked on with a team. It's a presentation and video sharing app built for Android and web. It was made to replace an existing flash app Indegene Life Systems Pvt ltd had for mobile and web. I had joined the project about 6 months into development. At this point the bare bones of the app was already set in place with Ionic and Angular 2. I worked on app scaling, new feature development and general UI implementation.

gallery.alt: indegene omnipresence heathcare app home screen

title: Lightbox Quote Checker
body:
Tells you whether the message you want to type will work with the letters and length of the sign. Will also allow for substitutions of characters.

This was a project I made working at Xello as part of their "Successful Futures Day". I got the slack bot working in the first day and worked towards the react site in the next few days. 

Integrates into Slack as a bot Here

Features:

  • Text alternatives (3 = E)
  • Character limits = (only 3 E’s)
  • Sentence length check (40 characters)
  • Invalid character check (A-Z, 0-9, #&@)
  • Word length check(Max 10 letters per word)
  • Too many line breaks in the sentence(Max 3 line breaks)

title: Metrick System / Trailerworks
body:
I worked with the Metrick System to build out two new client facing sites to rebrand both of their businesses. The first was metricksystem.com, which was designed to be a simple layout built in React that would highlight unique case studies they had, as well as managing their past case studies. 

The second site, trailerworks.com, was built on top of the existing React site but enhanced to feature dynamic layouts of case studies, drawing SVGs, light and dark theme of site as well as new and improved site look.

I helped to launch the randomactsofmusic.ca which featured the Yamaha: Going Solo Series site, with weekly updates relating to their YouTube channel.
tasks: Redux: light/dark theme, case studies, mailing list
Documentation for maintaining site, hosting and code

title: Tesla
body: I was partnered with another student to create a new UI for Tesla's dashboard, user dashboard and smartphone app. The theme we went with was dots and lines. I did the user dashboard and smartphone app.

title: TVO Kids
body: This was a rebuild of tvokids.com from a flash site to modern HTML5 site. It's a Drupal 7 site build using a custom built theme with a heavy javascript front-end. I was a part of a team while working on this at Digital Echidna. I mainly worked on the client side search, videos page and detail pages.
tasks: Responsive website with lots of touch options

title: U of T KPE
body: This was a rebuild of an existing site that required migration of their old content to there new site. This was a full Drupal 8 site build while Drupal 8 was still in development. This added some complexity because Drupal 8 wasn't widely used so there was a bit of research that needed to be done into custom modules. We followed a brand guideline placed out by U of T.

title: Ye Olde Dragon
body: This was made for a 3d mini competition for the website www.gameartisans.org. The competition was to make a low poly dragon character that was under 15000 tris with the use of 3 maps: spec, diffuse, and normal map at 2048 texture size.
